defineScope.accessibilitySupportBaseline: Website is accessible in latest versions of Chrome (81), Firefox, Edge, Safari with JAWS and VoiceOver screen readers

exploreTarget.essentialFunctionality: Watch out for that weird contact form

result.description:
## Problem:

Wikipedia globe logo does not have a text alternative (because it is a background image

## Solution

Make it an img tag with an alt attribute
